trends: There have been no other sightings in Clayton
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsAt 1 am my husband and I were looking at something on our laptop while lying in bed I looked out our windows and in the tree top I saw a triangle of light I watched for a few seconds as it was not moving I told my husband and he looked and at this time it slowly started to move and it passed over top of our house and my husband went out side and could not see any trace of it anywhere he then noticed that there was no sounds no planes or anything and we live near an airport but I have never seen a plane fly like this. The whole thing feels very strange because how the object was slow at first and the took off My husband was amazed by this and we both noted that the craft was hard to look directly at it was blury. It just went over the top of our house and disappered
Summary: Saw it out the window it sat and then took off.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Unknown
